The future is what we make it.When you join Honeywell, you become a member of our global team of thinkers, innovators, dreamers and doers who make the things that make the future.That means changing the way we fly, fueling jets in an eco-friendly way, keeping buildings smart and safe and even making it possible to breathe on Mars.Working at Honeywell isn’t just about developing cool things. That’s why all our employees enjoy access to dynamic career opportunities across different fields and industries.Are you ready to help us make the future?We have an opportunity for a Project Planning Manager to join our Honeywell Building Solutions Project Team in Riyadh, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.The Project Planning Manager is responsible for assisting the Commercial Department and the Project Managers with developing time plans and schedules on projects to ensure that the project is completed safely, on time and within budget.Project Planning Manager ResponsibilitiesEstablish project planning processes and procedure to be implemented throughout META region.
Develop project cost loaded baselines for all META region with the support of each project PM.
Ensure integration of all sub-schedules from customer, subcontractor and all involved functions.
Communicate with the project team members the agreed planned project milestones and the critical path leading to achieve project completion according to the planned dates.
Ensure schedule update and progress calculation mechanisms are standardized throughout META region.
Update schedules regularly and monitor progress of the project master schedule & milestones against the initial set baselines.
Develop standardized monthly reports and dashboard templates throughout META region
Ensures correct, timely and high-quality reporting.
Analyze the project critical paths, floats and potential deviations. Proactively report potential issues to the PM and recommend corrective actions.
Lead regular planning meetings with different cross functional teams to discuss project progress and potential issues.
Maintain and manage planning files and records in an organized manner.
Ensure compliance of Honeywell corporate guidelines in all functions.
Ensures that work is performed in accordance with Honeywell project internal processes and procedures.
Establish an effective tracking system for the administration of projects requirement in line with company procedures and guidelines.
Prepare and present the causes leading to the project delay using different delay analysis techniques.
Compile the backup documents that support the claim and ensure the correctness and organization of such documents.Qualifications and ExperienceExperience in both contracts and planning.
Strong English verbal and written communication skills.
Bachelor’s in Engineering.
7+ years’ experience in project planning and scheduling.We offerHoneywell offers employees the opportunity to work on the world’s most exciting projects, transforming the cities we live in, the buildings where we work, and the vehicles that move us. 
Group medical insurance plan Life.
Paid annual leave and time off work.
A culture that fosters inclusion, diversity and innovation.
Market specific training and on-going personal development.If this is your dream role, then we'd love to hear from you.We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company.
